alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 07 at 6:11AM MST until November 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Millard and Juab Counties and Southwest Utah. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 8 AM this morning to 8 PM MST this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties
